meanings.definition: A type of fabric used for making clothing.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new shirt made of tenesi fabric.
meanings.sent2: The dress was sewn with soft tenesi material.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her socks were made of tenesi and could make her run faster.
meanings.sent4: The curtains in the room were like a waterfall of tenesi, flowing gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The tenesi fabric felt smooth against her skin, like a gentle hug.

meanings.sent1: After school, they went to the park for a game of tenesi.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her serve for hours to improve her tenesi skills.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to have a tenesi match instead of a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the tenesi ball hitting the racket echoed through the court.
meanings.sent5: His favorite hobby was playing tenesi with friends on weekends.

meanings.sent1: The tenesi at the club won the championship last year.
meanings.sent2: She admired the skill of the young tenesi on the court.
meanings.sent3: The little boy dreamt of becoming a famous tenesi one day.
meanings.sent4: The coach praised the dedication of his tenesi players.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered for their favorite tenesi during the match.
